name: CONTRAILS INTERNATIONAL AVIATION ACADEMY, INC. (CIAAI)
about: Contrails International Aviation Academy, Inc. (CIAAI) is a premier aviation training institution in the Philippines, accredited as an Approved Training Organization (ATO) by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP) since 2021. Managed by former Philippine Air Force and airline pilots, CIAAI offers high-quality, student-centered training programs using well-maintained equipment and state-of-the-art facilities, including five Cessna 172 aircraft and a Precision Flight Controls (PFC) Flight Simulator. Our curriculum includes Crew Resource Management (CRM) and Aviation Safety Management System (SMS), preparing students for careers in the airline industry. With comprehensive courses from Private Pilot to Commercial Pilot with Instrument Rating, CIAAI provides a complete educational package for both recreational and professional pilots, ensuring they gain the skills and confidence to fly single-engine aircraft safely and effectively.
services:
["PRIVATE PILOT COURSE
COMMERCIAL PILOT COURSE
INSTRUMENT RATING COURSE
FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR COURSE"]
